item.title: End Bus. ID-13 West at ID-13 - Kooskia
item.description: End Bus. ID-13 West at ID-13 in Kooskia. Turn right for ID-13 east to US-12 jct; left for ID-13 west to (Kooskia) City Center.

item.title: US-12 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-12 west. Distance to Powell, Kooskia, and Lewiston.

item.title: US-12 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-12 west. Distance to Lolo Hot Springs and Lewiston Idaho.

item.title: US-93 South/US-12 West at US-12 - Lolo
item.description: US-93 South/US-12 West Split in Lolo. Turn right for US-12 west to Lewiston (Idaho); continue straight for US-93 south to Hamilton.

item.title: US-12 West/US-93 South - Bitterroot River
item.description: US-12 West/US-93 South - Bitterroot River

item.title: US-93 South/US-12 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-93 South/US-12 East. Distance to Lolo and Hamilton.

item.title: US-93 South at US-12/Bus. US-93 - Missoula
item.description: US-93 South (Reserve St.) at US-12/Bus. US-93 (Brooks St.) in Missoula.

item.title: US-93 South Approaching US-12 - Missoula
item.description: US-93 South (Reserve St.) approaching US-12 (Brooks St.) in Missoula. Turn right on Brooks St. to continue south on US-93 towards Missoula. US-12 and US-93 join southbound to Lolo.

item.title: I-182 East/US-12 East - Exits 14A and 14B
item.description: I-182 East/US-12 East at Exit 14A - WA-397 South/Finley/Oregon Ave. Exit 14B - US-395 North/Spokane. US-395 northbound leaves I-182/US-12 eastbound here.

item.title: I-182 East - Exit 14
item.description: I-182/US-12 East/US-395 North - Exit 14 - US-395 North/WA-397 South/Spokane/Finley. US-395 north leaves I-182/US-12 eastbound here.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-182/US-12
item.description: US-395 North approaching I-182 (West)/US-12 (West) to Spokane and Walla Walla. US-395 north joins US-12 and I-182 west briefly through Pasco.

item.title: US-395 North - Blue Bridge
item.description: Crossing the Blue Bridge over the Columbia River on US-395 north from Kennewick to Pasco Washington. Approaching left exit to Lewis St. Also approaching US-12 and I-182.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 37
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 37 - US-97 South/Goldendale/Bend, Ore. US-97 joins I-82 west to I-90 near Ellensburg. I-82/US-12 East overhead to Richland and Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 31A and 31B
item.description: I-82 east at Exits 31B - N 1st St. and Exit 31A - US-12 West/Naches. Continue east on I-82 for Richland. US-12 joins I-82 eastbound here to Richland.

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 31B and 31A - Entering Yakima
item.description: Entering Yakima on I-82 east crossing the Yakima River bridge. Approaching Exit 31B - N 1st St. and Exit 31A - US-12 West/Naches.

item.title: I-82 East - Exits 31B and 31A
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 31B - N 1st St. and approaching Exit 31A - US-12 West/Naches. US-12 joins I-82 eastbound to Richland.

item.title: I-82 East approaching US-12 Jct.
item.description: I-82 East approaching US-12 Jct. in Yakima County.

item.title: WA-260 North Approaching WA-261 South
item.description: WA-260 North Approaching WA-261 South to Starbuck and US-12. WA-261 joins WA-260 north to Washtucna.

item.description: US-12 East at To WA-125/Prescott/Pendleton (Oregon) interchange.

item.description: US-12 East approaching Heritage Road. Use Heritage Road for College Place and Walla Walla University.

item.title: US-12 East - Entering Lowden
item.description: Entering Lowden on US-12 east. Lowden is an unincorporated community in Walla Walla County.

item.description: Distance marker on US-12 east. Distance to Walla Walla and Lewiston (Idaho).

item.description: Distance marker on US-12 east. Distance to Walla Walla, Waitsburg, and Lewiston (Idaho).

item.description: US-12 East in Walla Walla County

item.title: US-12 West at US-730 West
item.description: US-12 West at US-730 West in Walla Walla County. Merge right to continue west on US-12. US-730 follows the Columbia River westbound into Oregon.

item.title: US-12 East at US-730
item.description: US-12 East at US-730. Merge right for US-730 west; left for US-12 east. This is the western end of US-730.

item.title: US-12 East at US-730
item.description: US-12 East at US-730. Use US-730 West to Pendleton (Oregon); US-12 East to Walla Walla.

item.title: US-12 East - Walla Walla River
item.description: US-12 East at Walla Walla River bridge. The Walla Walla River flows into the Columbia River immediately west of this bridge.

item.title: US-12 East Approaching US-730
item.description: US-12 East approaching US-730. All trucks use US-730 west, to access the Weigh Station.

item.title: End US-730 East at US-12
item.description: End US-730 East at US-12. Turn right for US-12 east to Walla Walla; left for US-12 west to Pasco.

item.title: End US-730 East at US-12
item.description: End US-730 East at US-12. Merge left for US-12 west to Pasco; right for US-12 east to Walla Walla.

item.title: US-730 East Approaching US-12
item.description: US-730 East approaching US-12 to Pasco and Walla Walla.

item.title: US-730 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-730 east. Distance to Jct. US-12, Pasco, and Walla Walla. This is the first distance marker eastbound along US-730 east in Washington.

item.title: US-12 East/US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 South/US-12 East to Grangeville, Missoula (MT - via US-12), and Boise.

item.title: US-95 South at US-12
item.description: US-95 south at US-12 junction. Merge right for US-12 West/Lewiston/Walla Walla (Washington). Use left lane for US-95 South/US-12 East/Missoula (Montana)/Boise. Use either lane for access to Runaway Truck Ramps.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: US-95 south approaching US-12. Use right lane for US-12 west to Lewiston; left lane for US-95 South/US-12 East to Boise.

item.title: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South - Exit 12A
item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South at Exit 12A - US-395 South/Kennewick/Pendleton (Oregon). US-395 south leaves I-182 here.

item.description: I-182/US-12 West/US-395 South at Exit 12A - US-395 South/Kennewick/Pendleton (Oregon). Continue west on I-182/US-12 for Richland.

item.description: US-395 South at I-182/US-12 in Pasco. Merge right to continue south on US-395, and I-182/Pendleton (Oregon)/Richland. US-395 south joins I-182 through Pasco.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching I-182/US-12
item.description: US-395 South approaching I-182/US-12 in Pasco. For Portland (Oregon), continue south on US-395.

item.title: US-395 South - I-182/US-12/WA-397 Jct.
item.description: US-395 South - I-182/US-12/WA-397 Jct. in Pasco. Continue on road south for WA-397 South to Finley. Merge right to continue south on US-395 and for I-182/US-12 West to Richland and Pendleton (Oregon). Use US-12 East for Walla Walla and Lewiston (Idaho).

item.title: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West - Exits 4, 3A, and 3B
item.description: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West at Exit 4 - WA-240 West/Wellsian Way/Vantage. Approaching Exit 3B - Queensgate North and Exit 3A - Queensgate South. WA-240 West leaves the I-182/US-12 freeway here.

item.title: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West - Exit 4
item.description: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West approaching Exit 4 - WA-240 West/Wellsian Way/Vantage. Continue west on I-182 for I-82 to Yakima and Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: WA-240 West at I-182 and George Washington Way
item.description: WA-240 West at I-182 and George Washington Way in Richland. Use right lane for I-182 East to Richland; and I-182 West/WA-240 West to Yakima. Continue straight for George Washington Way.

item.description: WA-240 West Approaching I-182 and George Washington Way in Richland. Use right lanes for I-182 and to continue west on WA-240. WA-240 joins I-182 west briefly.

item.description: MT-7 South at US-12 in Baker.

item.description: MT-7 South at US-12 in Baker. Turn right for US-12 west to Miles City; left for US-12 east to Bowman (North Dakota). Continue south on MT-7 for Ekalaka.

item.title: US-12 West at I-94 West and BL-94
item.description: US-12 West at I-94 West to Billings. US-12 joins I-94 westbound. Continue straight for BL-94 west to Miles City.

item.title: I-94 East - Exit 135
item.description: I-94 east approaching Exit 135 - BL-94/Miles City/Jordan. This is the western end of the Miles City business loop. Miles City is the county seat of Custer County and the 10th largest city in Montana.

item.title: I-94 East - Miles City Exits
item.description: Miles City Exits on I-94 east. The three exits all show the destination city accessed by that exit. The first exit is to Jordan (via MT-59 north), the second exit is to Broadus (via MT-59 south), and the third exit is to Baker (via US-12 east).

item.title: US-12 East/US-95 South - Distance Marker

item.title: Frontage Road at US-95/US-12
item.description: Frontage Road at US-12/US-95 junction. The steam in the background is from the Potlatch Paper Mill.

item.title: US-95 South at US-12
item.description: US-95 south at US-12 at the bottom of the Lewiston Hill. The welcome to Lewiston sign is right above the speed limit sign on the left side of the photo. Lewiston is the lowest city in Idaho - 738 feet. There are Runaway Truck Ramps on either side of the photo.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching US-12
item.description: Route diagram for US-95/US-12 junction on US-95 south. View of the Clearwater Valley and the city of Lewiston. The river in the background is the Clearwater River.
